All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, Realism, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class StockExchange
extends DetonatorSimulation

A DetonatorSimulation with the title "NYSE". Included to for legacy code that used the StockExchange class from JAGO v4.0.

Since:
5.0
See Also:
Serialized Form
